title: Multiscale Correlative Imaging Reveals Sequential and Heterogeneous Degradations in Fast-Charging Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01497A, Paper
Dechao Meng, Zhichen Xue, Guokang Chen, Dengke Zhou, Yushi He, Zi-Feng Ma, Yijin Liu, Linsen Li
Fast-charging lithium-ion batteries provide a promising solution to addressing the range anxiety of electric vehicles (EVs) but they face challenges in durability and safety. Kinetically-driven lithium-plating on the anode is...
